name: deposito-urbano-ios
description: iOS native app for Deposito Urbano

scripts.ios: cd /Users/lpiccone/Documents/GitHub/proyectoX/ios && xcodebuild -project DepositoUrbano.xcodeproj -scheme DepositoUrbano -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 14' build
scripts.test: cd /Users/lpiccone/Documents/GitHub/proyectoX/ios && xcodebuild test -project DepositoUrbano.xcodeproj -scheme DepositoUrbanoTests -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 14'
